Before anyone decides to complain about being forced into the client update, you should know that Riot considers OCE the "test" server. It's the sole reason we get patches before other servers, because Riot uses OCE as a way to find bugs faster.

You're whining will not change how Riot views OCE.

OCE was the first to join the client alpha test last year so it made sense to be the first to fully transfer to the new client.
Some other servers will be following closely behind.

Yes this does involve being the ones who have to bear the brunt of problems sometimes, but Riot OCE did not allow the change to being the first to patch/first to get features on the premise that we would be considered "the test server".
If anyone in Riot starts believing that, we'd need to have some serious conversations about why that's NOT allowed to be the case.
Patching first, at the time we do so, actually gives teams around the world much more capability to assist if things go wrong, and quickly follow up on a fix or revert.

We get the newest features first, and most of the time there are no problems. So for now we consider it a net positive gain that we are usually first in line for new stuff.
